abstract.p: Milk thistle is safe, well tolerated in different preparation form and producing no any serious side effects. Milk thistle seeds can be used in raw form or made into a tea. Milk thistle seed tea has significant attention, both in scientific and consumer communities owing to its health benefits against variety of maladies. Furthermore, it is exposed that overall anti‚Äêoxidant level improves in humans by using milk thistle tea. The free radicals quenching ability of milk thistle tea is better than black tea.
